Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: ~indirajith can you please confirm the version you are using? Thanks

Action.author: indirajith
Action.body: Yes, I am using Fabric v1.0 alpha2 and the host OS is Ubuntu 16.04.2. Thank you!

Action.author: indirajith
Action.body: I tried to remove the exact genesis.block file name in the ../base/docker-compose-base.yaml file, then the not a directory error for genesis.block gone but, it appears for the mps and tls directories. I tried to add and/or remove '/' at the end to imply it as a directory didn't work.

Action.author: kchristidis
Action.body: ( ~Clayton Sims : I removed the fabric-orderer component on purpose. There's nothing specific/exclusive to the orderer in this issue that I can see, but someone correct me if I'm wrong.)

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: ~indirajith any update on this? Can you please post your docker-compose.yaml so we can review?

Action.author: mastersingh24
